caption: The captain took everyone onto the bus and planned to drive back to the plane. However, Gaspare found that there were separatist forces on the way. Finally, the captain decided to negotiate with them. He knew this might cost his life and he would never meet his family again. But for his passengers, he was willing to take risks. The captain found the leader of the separatists and told him that the rescue team was now searching for them, he hoped that the separatists could let the passengers go home. But the leader didn't believe it, he planned to kill the captain. At this moment, the rescue team arrived and fought against the separatists, after that, they lead everyone escape from the prison.
